title: S7E07 – "The Depths of Death" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four spine-chilling tales from author Michael Paige, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about fearsome fires, fiendish friends, creepy copies, and near-death discoveries.
